entities.name: he
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who is able to recall the dead using a magical stone. ("Here he took out the stone... and he turned it thrice in his hand.")

entities.name: the girl
entities.description: A person who died untimely and was recalled by the protagonist using the magical stone. ("the ﬁgure of the girl... appeared at once before him.")

entities.name: Death
entities.description: A personification of death, who takes souls to the afterlife. ("And so Death took the second brother for his own.")

entities.name: the second brother
entities.description: One of the protagonist's brothers, who killed himself in hope of joining the girl in death. ("Finally the second brother... killed himself so as truly to join her.")

entities.name: the third brother
entities.description: The youngest of the protagonist's brothers, who eventually gave up his Cloak of Invisibility and went with Death. ("It was only when he attained a great age... that the youngest brother ﬁnally took oﬀ the Cloak of Invisibility.")
